title: shubha dinam iduvE
sahitya:
shubha dinam iduvE sutantara latAngi shivan hitam tarum kavi tandE inba rasam pozhinda


anupallavi

  abhayam aLitt-en ayyan aDimai tIrttanbuDan aNaittennai AnandamE nAm aduvenra


caraNam    sOdaraip-puyalaDi vAdanai tIravE sutantara vasantamAi vandu tand-amaidiyai 
nAthanE ennum un nAnarat-tAnAgi nAdam nAn enadu gItak-kuyil nI enra
